title: 404  not found on metrics port
body:
#### System information

erigon version 2021.08.1-alpha

Amazon Linux

#### Expected behaviour

Starting erigon with the following args:

```
    - --datadir=/home/erigon/.local/share/erigon                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
    - --metrics                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
    - --metrics.addr=0.0.0.0                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
    - --metrics.port=6060                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
    - --pprof                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
    - --pprof.addr=0.0.0.0                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
    - --pprof.port=6061                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
    - --private.api.addr=0.0.0.0:9090                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
    - --prune=hrtc 
```
when accessing `localhost:6060/metrics` or `localhost:6060` I expect to get metrics

#### Actual behaviour

`curl localhost:6060` does not return metrics and prometheus failed to scrape

#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour

`curl localhost:6060`
